item.title: iReporters watch planets, moon align
item.ExtractedText: iReporters watch as planets, moon come together Story Highlights Venus, Jupiter and the moon formed a bright triangle in the night sky iReporters around the world captured photos of the celestial event The next time the three will be as close and visible will be November 18, 2052
